title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the Top5Summarizer tool, including input formats, output formats, performance expectations, specific constraints or limitations, user interface requirements, security and privacy considerations, deployment and scaling requirements, and any other relevant aspects.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the main components, their interactions, and the data flow between them.

title: Develop Text Summarization Algorithm
description: Research and develop the core algorithm for summarizing lengthy text into a concise 'Top 5' format.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the Top5Summarizer tool, allowing users to input documents and view the generated summaries.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Implement a database or other storage solution for storing and managing user documents and generated summaries.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate authentication, authorization, and data protection measures.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Automation
description: Define a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, and implement automated testing frameworks.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for automating builds, tests, and deployments, ensuring a smooth and reliable release process.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, usage instructions, and troubleshooting tips.
